# Lust (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers (Su):** Once per day as a free action, you gain an enhancement bonus to Charisma equal to your cleric level. The power lasts for 1 round.

**Lust Domain Spells**

**1 [[Charm Person (Spell)|Charm Person]]:** Makes one person your friend.

**2 [[Invisibility (Spell)|Invisibility]]:** Subject is invisible for 1 minute/level or until it attacks.

**3 [[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|Clairaudience/Clairvoyance]]:** See or hear at a distance for 1 minute/level.

**4 [[Planar Ally, Lesser (Spell)|Planar Ally, Lesser]] <sup>X</sup>:** Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.

**5 [[Scrying (Spell)|Scrying]] <sup>F</sup>:** Spies on subject from a distance.

**6 [[Symbol of Persuasion (Spell)|Symbol of Persuasion]] <sup>M</sup>:** Triggered rune charms nearby creatures.

**7 [[Refuge (Spell)|Refuge]] <sup>M</sup>:** Alters item to transport its possessor to you.

**8 [[Sympathy (Spell)|Sympathy]] <sup>F</sup>:** Object or location attracts certain creatures.

**9 [[Trap the Soul (Spell)|Trap the Soul]] <sup>MF</sup>:** Imprisons subject within gem.
